name: Simulation: B
description:
Simulation: B

A project made for my first year in University. Our aim was to take a game we love and use its mechanics and our own ideas to make a new short game.

So I took SuperHOT one of my favourite games and added parkour and a small story to it, and thus we have Simulation: B

I am not sure what will happen with this project but I hope you enjoy. First full Unreal Engine project and my first 3D project.

Thanks for playing :)

....Yes the Exe is called Assignment 2 I am sorry...it was my 2nd Assignment and changing names broke Unreal when trying to package the game.
